amendment.description: To create a deficit-neutral reserve fund for addressing the long term fiscal challenges facing our nation, by creating a bipartisan commission or process to consider all parts of the budget, with everything on the table for discussion.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 3148 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 3148 proposed by Senator Conrad. (consideration: CR S2253, S2260; text: CR S2253) To create a deficit-neutral reserve fund for addressing the long term fiscal challenges facing our nation, by creating a bipartisan commission or process to consider all parts of the budget, with everything on the table for discussion.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3148 proposed by Senator Conrad.
